greeting-p0:
I'm Madeleine!
Great to meet you!

I know things might be confusing for you or scary, but I know quite a lot about reproductive health so don't worry! I can help you by answering questions, giving hygiene product recommendations, or connecting you with local resources! I'm also multi-lingual! What would you like to do?
greeting-p1:
Great, try asking me a question!
I can answer something like 'What is a STD?'
You can also discover new questions by saying 'Show me random questions!'
Go for it!
greeting-p10: Great! Your best choice is to go with tampons! They make it easy for you to move around after you learn how to put them on! Check out Local Resources to find out where you can get tampons near you.
greeting-p11: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p12: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p13: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p2: Ok! I'm going to ask you a few questions to see what product is best for you. I know it's hard to figure out which one works best for you! Do you like to exercise during your period?
greeting-p3: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p4: Great! You will be most comfortable going with tampons since they make it easier for you to move around, especially if you want to swim. Check out Local Resources to find out where you can get tampons near you!
greeting-p5: And how would you describe your menstrual flow? I know it's scary to have a lot of blood come out of your body at once.
greeting-p6: Finally, how comfortable are you with your body?
greeting-p7: Great! You will be most comfortable going with panty liners! They can catch a lot of blood and stay very well! Check out Local Resources to find out where you can get panty liners near you.
greeting-p8: What specifically are you looking for?
greeting-p9: No problem! Your best choice is to go with pads! They are super easy to put on and also can hold a lot of blood. Check out Local Resources to find out where you can get pads near you!
